verbs.description: * Canadian dollar at C $ 1.3013 , or 76.85 U.S. cents . [ARG0: Trump] [V: fired] off [ARG1: a volley of tweets] [ARGM-TMP: on Monday] [C-ARG1: venting anger] on NATO allies , the European Union and Trudeau in the wake of a divisive G7 meeting in Quebec over the weekend . Canada sends about 75 percent of its exports to the United States and so its economy would be badly hit if NAFTA were scrapped .
